attributes.action: rule against the plans of making people work for their benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: following a new scheme for the job centre made by the government making the unemployed people who sign on at the job ctr work for the benefits on a full time basis. I and The people who are on the all types of benefits  who are looking for jobs and getting the lack of support from the job ctr believe it should be the job centre plus punished and not its customers for working to earn the benefits we rightly deserve without having to work for it and i demand that all the new plans should be scrapped
